content.rendered:
Ibrahim is an accountant, lecturer, community leader and the current project coordinator for a Community £6m circa Re: Building Project in SE London, UK. He arrived in the UK in 1980 to study accountancy.

On attainment of the Chartered Certified Accountant status Ibrahim worked as the Finance Director in the telecommunication sector, a company set up and operated with a friend.  He subsequently worked, for close to a decade, as Project Accountant in Her Majesty Revenue & Customs.  And, since 2010 has been working as associate lecturer within the Higher Education including Regent College since April 2016. His specialism includes: Financial Management; Financial Accounting; Management Accounting; Global Business Environment; Managing & Running a Small Business; Planning for Growth and Research Report.
